eu/poland/rules.content:
#Musical.ly 1 Million Audition Europe Contest Rules
#(“Official Rules”)

**1. HOW TO ENTER:**  The Musical.ly 1 Million Audition Europe Contest (the “Contest”) is operated and promoted by musical.ly, Inc., 2461 Santa Monica Blvd, P.O. Box # 344, Santa Monica, CA 90404. (the "Promotor"). To participate in the Contest you must submit your Contest entry through the Musical.ly mobile application (collectively, the "App" and the “Entry”) between 12:00 a.m. GMT on May 11, 2018 through 8:00 a.m. GMT on May 28, 2018 (the “Contest Period”),

The Contest is an audition where we discover the next wave of creators who could potentially reach 1 Million followers on the App. Visit https://www.musical.ly/act/eu and follow the instructions described on the Contest webpage (the “Instructions”) on how to submit your Entry. There is no purchase or entrance fee of any kind required to enter or win the Contest. All Entries must be submitted via the App and tagged with the specific category hashtags described below. Entries should also be tagged with the hashtag #Contest. All requested Entry information must be completed at the time of submission via the App.  

By registering for the Contest and/or submitting an Entry, each participant is providing his/her personal data to the Promotor as data controller. The personal data an entrant provides will be used exclusively by the Promotor for the administration of the Contest and (if he/she agrees) to be contacted regarding future competitions and events of the Promotor.  Promotor’s use of information submitted by entrants in connection with this Contest will be subject to the terms and conditions stated in these Official Rules as well as to the Promotor's Privacy Policy available at  https://musical.ly/en-US/privacy.

**All Entries must meet the following criteria:**

•	Participants will be able to choose between the following five categories: Comedy Audition, Sports Audition, Food Audition, Talent Audition, Fashion Audition (each a “Category” and collectively "Categories") and must upload videos using the hashtag of the chosen Category.
•	Entries must be no longer than 1 minutes in length.
•	Entries must be original, exclusively created and owned by entrant, and the entrant must have all rights necessary to post the video and submit the Entry, including written permission from anyone shown in the video.
•	Entries may be submitted by uploading through the App. 
•	Entries must not previously have been publicly available or used in any other promotion or contest.
•	Entries may not contain images of any individuals who are under 18 years of age or who have not provided their authorization.  By submitting an image of any individual under the age of 18, you represent that you have received permission from such minor’s parent or legal guardian to include such minor’s image. 
•	All auditions must be conducted in a safe and responsible manner, having due regard for the physical, mental and moral effects to all individuals involved. 
•	Participants must have no connection to the Promotor or to any judge used in the Contest, including through employment and through employment of any family member.
•	Entries may not contain material that is obscene, defamatory, libelous, threatening, pornographic, racially or ethnically offensive, unlawful, or encourages conduct that would be considered a criminal offense, give rise to civil liability, or violate any law. Entries must be appropriate for viewing by the general public; appropriateness will be determined by Promotor. 
Promotor reserves the right to reject any entry for any reason in its discretion.

**ELIGIBILITY:** Each entrant must be a current UK, France, Italy, Poland, Netherland, Hungary, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Romania, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Finland, Ireland, legal resident who is at least 18 years of age for the duration of the Contest Period.  The Promotor anticipates a high volume of entries to the Contest which are to be assessed on a skill and quality basis by Promotor and the algorithm or its designees. Entrants may need to submit a minimum of 1 Entry and when making their submission, must agree to the terms and conditions of Promotor’s General Terms and Conditions, a copy of which can be found at http://www.musical.ly/en-US/term. Affiliates, subsidiaries, advertising, promotion, and fulfillment agencies or Promotor, and immediate family members and persons of employees, officers and directors of Promotor living in their same household, are not eligible to participate in the Contest.  


**2. WINNERS:** Winner of the Contest will be determined based on the following:  

There will be two rounds:

**Round 1**
Round 1 will last from the beginning of the Contest Period until 11:59 p.m. GMT on May 20, 2018 (the “Round 1 Period”). Following the Round 1 Period, each Entry will be given a "creator score" by algorithm, which will be calculated based on factors including video quality, skill, engagement, creativity, popularity and originality, as well as fitness for the proposed theme as indicated by the chosen hashtag. Promotor will select the best 300 Entries across all Categories and Countries based on the ranking of “creator score”. The promotor reserve the right to select fewer than 300 winners if, in their sole discretion, the skill or quality of Entries does not meet a minimum standard of criteria, to be determined by the promotor. As part of Round 1 to move to Round 2 of the Contest is a “Round 1 Selection.” 

**Round 2**
The Round 2 Period will start from 12:00 a.m. GMT on May 22, 2018 and end at 11:59 p.m. GMT on May 27, 2018.  The Promotor will select 100 winners from the Round 1 Selections across all Categories and Countries, based on a combination of Round 1 and Round 2 "creator score" by algorithm.  The 100 Round 2 Audition winners will each be a “Round 2 Winner.”  Each Category Top 1 winner from Round 2 will be a “musical.ly’s Choice Winner.”

Because this is a contest of skill and social media impact, winning the Contest is dependent on the quality and number of submissions received.  The Promotor will assess the quality and creativeness of Entries using algorithmic scoring to calculate the quality of entrant’s performance during the Contest based on entrants’ videos quality, skill, engagement, creativity, popularity and originality, as well as fitness for the proposed theme as indicated by the chosen hashtag relevant data. 


**3.NOTIFICATION:** Round 1 Selections will be announced on May 21, 2018 at 1 Million Audition Europe website https://www.musical.ly/act/eu. Round 2 Winners and musical.ly’s Choice Winners will be announced on May 28, 2018 at 1 Million Audition Europe website https://www.musical.ly/act/eu. Round 1 Selections, Round 2 Winners and musical.ly’s Choice Winners will be displayed on the website at https://www.musical.ly/act/eu. Promotor will also attempt to notify individuals via their Musical.ly account accessible via the App, email, telephone. By participating, entrants agree to these Official Rules and the determination of winners by the Promotor, which shall be final and binding in all respects (including as to the application and interpretation of the judging algorithms). Entry in the Contest and acceptance of any prize constitutes permission to use entrant’s name, without further compensation, except where prohibited by law and as otherwise provided herein. 

**4.PRIZES:**

**Round 2 Winners**
There will be 100 Round 2 Winners. Each Round 2 Winner will receive an amount between worth $250-$850 determined by their overall score awarded by the algorithm "creator score" , as follows: the Top 20 Winners regardless of Category will each receive $850, the Top 21-50 Winners regardless of Category will each receive $500, the Top 51-100 Winners regardless of Category will each receive $250. This will be payable in a form to be determined by Promotor and subject to such Round 2 Winner providing all necessary information when requested by the Promotor to collect his or her prize.

**musical.ly’s Choice Winners**
There will be five musical.ly’s Choice Winners. Each of them is the Top 1 of the category from the algorithm "creator score" ranking. Each musical.ly’s Choice Winner will be awarded $850 and the following:

(i) a roundtrip economy flight or train to London, U.K. selected by Promotor from the major commercial airport or train station closest to winner’s residence to attend a whole day workshop of professional video shooting with the other musical.ly’s Choice Winners (the "Flight" “Train”); and
(ii) hotel accommodations for two nights, standard accommodation at a hotel in London selected by Promotor (the "Hotel", collectively the "Prize") ; and
(iii) official promotion package, includes a trending hashtag official video, crown (if the Winner haven’t been crowned), opening page, official account shout-out, in-app banner for one month.

ARV of each musical.ly’s Choice Winner’s prize package is approximately $3090, although it may vary depending on the point of departure. The Prize is non-transferrable and non-refundable. The Promotor will not, under any circumstances, substitute the Flight or Train or Hotel with a cash alternative in the event that a Grand Prize Winner does not accept the Hotel and Flight (including if they cannot travel on the date specified below). 

The trip must be taken on 1st June (departure) and 3rd June (return). If winner cannot travel on the dates specified, the prize may be forfeited.  All travel arrangements must be made through a travel agent selected by Promotor.  If a winner lives within a 200-mile radius of the hotel designated by Promotor, prize will not include the transportation portion of the prize. Winner will be responsible for all gratuities, meals, beverages, ground transportation, taxes, and any other incidental costs or expenses not identified in these Official Rules. 

Total ARV of all prizes: $55,700.  No financial or other compensation will be made for any other use of the Entry.  Winner will be attempted to be notified through [their Musical.ly account accessible via the app, email or telephone] Prizes are not transferable; no substitutions or cash equivalents are allowed except by the Promotor who reserves the right to award a prize of equal or greater value in the event of non-availability. 

**5. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY:** Ownership of the pre-existing underlying intellectual property of the entrant remains the property of the entrant subject to Promotor’s rights to reprint, display, reproduce, perform, use, and exhibit the Entry for the purpose of administering and promoting the Contest and for Promotor’s marketing and advertising purposes.  By participating in the Contest, each entrant grants to Promotor a non-exclusive, worldwide, fully paid, royalty-free, perpetual, transferable license to reprint, display, reproduce, perform, use, and exhibit (including the right to make derivative works of) the Entry and materials and information submitted on and in connection with the Contest or use or receipt of the prize for any and all purposes in any medium.  Each participating entrant hereby warrants that any Entry and other materials and information provided by entrant are original with entrant and do not violate or infringe upon the copyrights, trademarks, rights of privacy, publicity, moral rights or other intellectual property or other rights of any person or entity, and do not violate any rules or regulations.  If the Entry or information or materials provided by entrant contain any material or elements that are not owned by entrant and/or which are subject to the rights of third parties, entrant represents he or she has obtained, prior to submission of the Entry and information or materials, any and all releases and consents necessary to permit use and exploitation of the Entry and information and materials by Promotor in the manner set forth in the Official Rules without additional compensation.  

Each entrant warrants that the Entry and materials and information provided do not contain information considered by entrant, its employees or personnel, or any other third party to be confidential, and that the Entry, materials and information provided do not violate any laws or regulations.  Entrant agrees that Promotor has the right to verify the ownership and originality of all Entries and that, upon Promotor’s request, entrant must submit a written copy of any release or permission entrant has received from a third party granting entrant the right to use such property.  Entrant understands and acknowledges that in the event a submission is selected as a winning Entry, and entrant’s ownership, rights and the originality of the Entry cannot be verified to the satisfaction of Promotor or is in any other way ineligible, Promotor may select an alternate winner based on the same judging criteria.

**6.GENERAL RULES:** In the event of a dispute regarding any Entry, that Entry will be deemed made by the authorized holder of the Musical.ly account associated with the Entry at the time of the Entry submission.  By participating in this Contest, entrants agree to be bound by these Official Rules and the decisions of the Promotor. The Promotor is not responsible for technical, hardware, software or telephone malfunctions of any kind, lost or unavailable network connections, or failed, incorrect, incomplete, inaccurate, garbled or delayed electronic communications caused by the user or by any of the equipment or programming associated with or utilized in this Contest or by any human error which may occur in the processing of the online entries in this Contest. 

The Promotor reserves the right at its sole discretion to disqualify any entrant that tampers or attempts to tamper with the Entry process or the operation of the Contest or website; violates the Official Rules; or acts in an unsportsmanlike or disruptive manner, or with intent to annoy, abuse, threaten or harass any other person. Any attempt by any person to deliberately undermine the legitimate operation of the Contest may be a violation of criminal and civil law, and, should such an attempt be made, Promotor reserves the right to seek damages from any such person and entrant to the fullest extent permitted by law. 

Promotor's failure to enforce any term of these Official Rules shall not constitute a waiver of that provision.  Promotor reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel, terminate, modify or suspend the Contest if it is not capable of running as planned, including, but not limited to, infection by computer virus, tampering, unauthorized intervention, fraud, technical failures or any other problems beyond the control of the Promotor and award the prize from among all eligible online Entries received prior to cancellation. Promotor

**7.LIMITATION OF LIABILITY:** The Promotor does not exclude or limit its liability for personal injury or death caused by its negligence or for fraudulent misrepresentation or any other liability that may not, by law, be limited or excluded. 

The Promotor accepts no liability in relation to an entrant's participation (or inability to participate) in this Contest, including without limitation any use made by any of the winners of (or inability to use) their respective prizes, to the maximum extent permitted by law.  Without prejudice to that general exclusion, the Promotor will not be liable for any loss of income, profits, sales or damage to reputation, incurred by any entrant.

**8.DISPUTES:**  Except where prohibited by law, as a condition of participating in this Contest, each entrant agrees that (i) any and all disputes and causes of action arising out of or connected with the Contest, or any prize awarded and the enforceability of these Official Rules, shall be governed by laws of England and subject to the jurisdiction of the courts of England.

**9.WINNER’S LIST:** The names of the winners will be posted via  https://www.musical.ly/act/eu for a period of time beginning on or about May 21, 2018 for Round 1 and May 21, 2018 for Round 2.  Requests for the name of the winner may also send a self-addressed, stamped envelope making such request to musical.ly, Inc., Musical.ly 1 Million Audition Contest, 2461 Santa Monica Blvd, P.O. Box # 344, Santa Monica, CA 90404.  
**10.PROMOTOR:**  Sponsor of this Promotion is musical.ly, Inc., Musical.ly 1 Million Audition Contest, 2461 Santa Monica Blvd, P.O. Box # 344, Santa Monica, CA 90404.

Each potential winner may be required to show proof of being the authorized holder. The entrant must be a registered member of Musical.ly with his or her own account%2C or use an email address to enter.  Employees of Sponsor and any of its parent and affiliate companies%2C the immediate family (spouse%2C parents%2C siblings and children) and household members of each such employee%2C and any person involved in or an immediate family member of someone involved in the administration and execution of this Promotion%2C are not eligible. %0A%0A*4.%09Prizes. * There will be one (1) prize for each prize period (one week) and three (3) prizes total. TAXES AND ANY OTHER COSTS%2C IF ANY%2C RELATED TO THE PRIZE ARE THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE WINNER.
